import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; const Products = ({ mobile, token }) => { const [post, setpost] = useState('') const [baseurl, setbaseurl] = useState([]) const getpost = async () => { const { data } = await axios({ url: 'http://localhost:4000/get_products', method: 'POST', headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Bearer " + token }, }) setpost(data.products) console.log(data.products) } useEffect(() => { console.log(token) window.scrollTo(0, 0) getpost(); }, []) return (
Products
